item.title: wifi blues
item.description: i need to send in my laptop and I need to remember this, this and finally this…

item.title: laptop..
item.description: so I saved up my money and got a laptop.. well I haven’t actually got it yet.. but I ordered a laptop. Its a super-mini… like 3.4 lbs its little. anyway.. I got bored
